title: * Montrose meets River Oaks *1920s Vintage * 1 bed / 1 bath + study
posting_body: Restored and updated 1 bed / 1 bath vintage flat in 1920's Montrose duplex.
- Large living and dining areas with open concept floorplan.
- Period style kitchen w/ updated / stainless appliances.
- All new bath
- Large private / fenced / outdoor / covered porch w/ stairs down to small, private court-yard.
- 1 full bedrooms + bonus sun-room / study / office space.
- Tall ceilings and original 1920's mouldings.
- Central air and heat.
- Original hardwood floors in beautiful condition.
(Just refinished and stained a dark ebony color.)
- Lots of windows and natural light.
- Washer and dryer included (inside the unit).
- Off-street, assigned parking (2 parking spaces available for this unit)
- Excellent River Oaks-meets-Montrose location near W Gray and Waugh.
- A cat or two is not a problem.
No dogs.
This unit has been beautifully restored and updated.
100 yr old building with only 3 owners during that entire time.
(I've owned it for the past 23 yrs.)
Art Deco / 1920's era architectural details + modern / updated mechanicals (plumbing / electrical / HVAC).

Owner is just finishing up a pretty major update of the space--including quite a few new windows, refinishing / staining the hardwood floors, a brand new bathroom (no pics of that yet; still in progress), a lot of painting, etc.
Excellent floorplan with a lot of space and a lot of natural light.
For more information or to request a showing reply to this posting via email or call / text the number listed.
